```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(DataExplorer)
library(esquisse)
library(plotly)
library(sf)
library(devtools)
library(usmapdata)
library(usmap)
library(ggplot2)
library(maps)
library(waffle)

```



```{r read in data}
childhealthdata <- read_csv("C:/Users/rebec/Documents/GitHub/FinalProject_A/2019-2020 National Survey of Children's Health (NSCH)/ChildHealthData_Edited_1920_ONLY.csv")

names(childhealthdata) <- make.names(names(childhealthdata), unique=TRUE)
```



```{r editing variables}
#race 

childhealthdata$Race = as.factor(childhealthdata$Race) # converting to categorical

childhealthdata <- childhealthdata %>% mutate(RaceCat = recode(Race, 
  "1" = "Hispanic",
  "2" = "White",
  "3" = "Black",
  "4" = "Asian",
  "5" = "Other",
  "99" = "Unknown",
  .default = "Unknown"))

#health status
  
childhealthdata <- mutate(childhealthdata,
          ChildHealthStatus = 
          recode_factor(ChildHealthStatus_1920, 
  "3" = "Fair or Poor",
  "2" = "Good",
  "1" = "Excellent or Very Good",
  "99" = "Unknown",
  .ordered = TRUE,
  .default = "Unknown"))

#sex

childhealthdata$Sex1920 = as.factor(childhealthdata$Sex1920) # converting to categorical

childhealthdata <- childhealthdata %>% mutate(Sex = recode(Sex1920, 
  "1" = "Male",
  "2" = "Female",
  "99" = "Missing",
  .default = "Missing"))

#flourishing status 

childhealthdata <- childhealthdata %>% mutate(FlourishStatus0to5 = recode_factor(flrish0to5_1920, 
  "1" = "Meets 0-2 Items",
  "2" = "Meets 3 Items",
  "3" = "Meets all 4 Items",
  "4" = "Never",
  "90" = "NA, Over 5",
"95" =  "NA, under 6m",
  "99" = "Unknown",
  .ordered = TRUE,
  .default = "Unknown"))


childhealthdata <- childhealthdata %>% mutate(FlourishStatus6to17 = recode_factor(flrish6to17_1920, 
  "1" = "Meets 0-1 Items",
  "2" = "Meets 2 Items",
  "3" = "Meets all 3 Items",
  "90" = "NA, Under 5",
  "99" = "Unknown",
  .ordered = TRUE,
  .default = "Unknown"))

#forgoing care

childhealthdata$ForgoneCare_1920 = as.factor(childhealthdata$ForgoneCare_1920) # converting to categorical

childhealthdata <- childhealthdata %>% mutate(ForegoneCare = recode_factor(ForgoneCare_1920, 
  "1" = "Went Without",
  "2" = "Received Need Care",
  "99" = "Unknown",
  .default = "Unknown"))

#behavioral probs 

childhealthdata <- childhealthdata %>% mutate(behaviorprob = recode_factor(behavior_1920, 
  "1" = "No",
  "2" = "Used to",
  "3" = "Yes",
  "99" = "Unknown",
  "96" = "NA Under 3",
  .ordered = TRUE,
  .default = "Unknown"))

#neighborhood safe

childhealthdata <- childhealthdata %>% mutate(NbhdSafe = recode_factor(NbhdSafe_1920,
  "3" = "Disagree",
  "2" = "Somewhat Agree",
  "1" = "Definitely Agree",
  "99" = "Unknown",
  .ordered = TRUE,
  .default = "Unknown"))

#poverty level

childhealthdata <- childhealthdata %>% mutate(povlevel = recode_factor(povlev4_1920, 
  "1" = "Below 100% FPL",
  "2" = "100-199% FPL",
  "3" = "200-399% FPL",
  "4" = "Greater than 400% FPL",
  .ordered = TRUE,
  .default = "Unknown"))

childhealthdata <- childhealthdata %>% mutate(povlevelgrouped = recode(povlev4_1920, 
  "1" = "Below 200% FPL",
  "2" = "Below 200% FPL",
  "3" = "200% or above FPL",
  "4" = "200% or above FPL",
  .default = "Unknown"))

#emotional support 

childhealthdata <- childhealthdata %>% mutate(EmSupport_1920 = recode_factor(EmSupport_1920,
  "1" = "Yes",
  "2" = "No",
  "99" = "Unknown",
  .default = "Unknown"))

#insured 

childhealthdata <- childhealthdata %>% mutate(InsGap_1920 = recode(InsGap_1920, 
  "1" = "Insured",
  "2" = "Periods Uninsured",
  "99" = "Unknown",
  .default = "Unknown"))

#mothers mental health

childhealthdata <- childhealthdata %>% mutate(MotherMH = recode_factor(MotherMH_1920,
  "1" = "Excellent or Very Good",
  "2" = "Good",
  "3" = "Fair or Poor",
  "99" = "Unknown",
  "95" = "No Mother in Home",
  .ordered = TRUE,
  .default = "Unknown"))


#ACEct_1920 - NOT making categorical 
```

```{r creating new variables}
#filters
FiveAndUnder <- childhealthdata %>%
  filter(Child.Age <= 5)

NewJersey <- childhealthdata %>%
  filter(State.FIPS.Code == "34")

Poor <- childhealthdata %>%
  filter(povlevel == "Less than 200% FPL")

MissedNeededCare <- childhealthdata %>%
  filter(ForegoneCare == "Yes")

parentEmoSup <- childhealthdata %>%
  filter(SomeoneEmoSup == 1)

yesbehaviorprobsALL <- childhealthdata %>%
  filter(behavior_1920 == "Yes")

White <- childhealthdata %>%
  filter(RaceCat == "White")

Black <- childhealthdata %>%
  filter(RaceCat == "Black")

Asian <- childhealthdata %>%
  filter(RaceCat == "Asian")

Hispanic <- childhealthdata %>%
  filter(RaceCat == "Hispanic")

OtherRace <- childhealthdata %>%
  filter(RaceCat == "Other")

#creating new variables 

flourishing6to17 <- childhealthdata %>% 
  group_by(FlourishStatus6to17) %>% 
  count() %>% arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  rename("children" = n)

MissedCarebyState <- MissedNeededCare %>%
  group_by(State.FIPS.Code) %>%
  count() %>% arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  rename("children" = n)
```
